page.title: 09Games played 20 years ago
page.content:
THE GIRD AND HOOK You would guide the gird (wheel without spokes) along the road with the hook (long metal rod) for as long as you could.
WATER WATER WALL FLOWER Everbody stands in a row along a wall with their faces towards the front. 1 person walks up and down the row pretending to be wall flowers, saying a rhyme over and over again!
Growing up so high, We are all maidens, And we shall all die, Except for Clara Higgins, She's the nicest of them all So she can dance and She can sing And her face turns to the wall
